metadata.title: Apne healing ke safar par humein join kariye
metadata.description: Bloom aapke sath hai, taki aap apne ghavon se ubhraein, behtar banein aur aagey badein ek behtar future ke liye. Ye aapko Chayn dwara laya gaya hai, jo duniya bhar ke bache logon aur sahyogion dwara chalaya jane wala ek vishv vyaapi gair-laabhkar sanstha hai.
metadata.imageAlt: Ek insan ke chehre aur kandhon ki tasveer, jiske upar bade patte aur phool khil rahe hain. Bloom ka logo bhi ismein shamil hai.

footer.fundedByTitle: Yeh kaam fund kiya gaya hai by
footer.chaynDescription: Bloom aapke liye <link>Chayn</link> dwara laya gaya hai, jo ek veshvik non-profit sanstha hai, jise duniya bhar ke survivors aur samarthak chalate hai. Vo ling-adharit hinsa se guzre hue logon ki healing ke liye sansadhan banate hain.

maintenanceBanner.title: Rakharakhaav ke lie Bloom band hai
maintenanceBanner.description: jab tak ham kuchh aavashyak niyojit rakharakhaav poora kar len, krpaya hamaare saath bane rahen. bloom hamesha kee tarah kuchh hee {hours} ghanton mein upalabdh ho jaana chaahie.

fruitzRetirementBanner.title: Aapke course mein badlaav
fruitzRetirementBanner.description: Fruitz app x Bloom saajhedaaree samaapt ho rahee hai, lekin aapka Bloom support jaari rahega. 19 agast se, ‘Dating, Boundaries, aur Relationships’ course uplabdh nahi rahega, lekin anya sabhi services, jismein 1:1 messaging shamil hai, pehle ki tarah chalu rahengi.

noDataAvailable.title: Is pej ko lod karane mein kuchh samasya huee. krpaya vaapas jaen aur jaldee hee punah prayaas karen, ya sampark karen

error.title: Kuch galat ho gaya
error.description: Pichhle request mein kuch samasya thi, kripya dobara prayas karein. Yadi samasya bani rahti hai, to Bloom team se sampark karein.

notFound.title: 404 - Page nahi mila
notFound.authenticatedDescription: Yeh page nahi mila. URL ko check karein ya courses ke page par vapis jayen.
notFound.unauthenticatedDescription: Yeh page nahi mila. URL check kariya ya fir welcome page par vapis jaiye
notFound.authenticatedRedirectButton: Courses ke page par vapis jaiye

alt.bloomBumbleLogo: Bloom ki partnership Badoo logo ke saath
alt.bloomBadooLogo: Bloom ki partnership Badoo logo ke saath
alt.bloomHead: ek vyakti ke chehre aur kandho ka chitra hai, jiske upar bade patte aur fool khile hue hain
alt.leafMix: Illustration of two leaves joined with a rose
alt.leafMixBee: Illustration of two leaves with a bee hovering above
alt.leafMixDots: Illustration of 3 leaves with a flower in the middle, and dots shooting from the flower.
alt.personTea: Chai pakde baithe vyakti ka chitran
alt.chooseTherapist: Illustration of a side profile of a person's face, with a flower
alt.dateSelector: Illustration of a calendar with a heart in the middle
alt.change: Ek chakra ka chitran - ke chakra mein teen sooraj unke beech mein teer.
alt.confidential: Illustration of a document with a lock in the corner
alt.cookieCat: Chitra mein ek billi araam kar rahi hai ek biscuit ke saath.
alt.bloomFruitzLogo: Bloom ki partnership Fruitz logo ke saath
alt.bloomHomeIllustration: Person sitting crossed legged with symbols floating around such as a video icon, flower, message icon and a persons head with a flower

cookieConsent.cookieConsentExplainer: Kripya analytics cookies ki anumati dein taki hum Bloom mein sudhaar kar sakein. Humare mein aur padein.

signUpTodayPromo.title: Free account ke liye aaj he sign up karein
signUpTodayPromo.description1:
Bloom ek online platform hai jo apko apke ghavon se ubharne aur heal hone mein madad karta hai. Bloom par bahut sar alag alag suvidhaye hain - 
Video courses, vichar sambhanti activities, aur toh aur aap humari team se seedha message par baat kar sakte hain.
signUpTodayPromo.description2: Sign up kariye aur vo sara content dekhiye jo Bloom aapko offer karta hai.

loginDialog.title: Bloom mein login karein ya ek naya account banayein
loginDialog.description: Hamaaree sabhee saamagree tak pahunchane aur Bloom dvaara pesh kee jaane vaalee har cheej ka pata lagaane ke lie nihshulk sain ap karen

exerciseNames.activities-mapping-fear-and-stress-in-ou: Darr aur tanav ko apne shareer mein samjhna
exerciseNames.activities-letter-to-a-part-of-my-body: Mere shareer ke ek hisse ko khatt
exerciseNames.grounding-what-can-you-hear: Kya tum mujhe sun sakte ho?
exerciseNames.grounding-coming-back-to-your-safe-space: Apni safe space mein wapis ana
exerciseNames.grounding-compassionate-body-scan: Sahanbhooti se shareer ko mehsoos karna

pwaBanner.mobileDescription: Apne homescreen se access ke liye app ko install karein
pwaBanner.desktopDescription: Apne homescreen se Bloom tak access pane ke liye app ko install karein
pwaBanner.iosDescription: Bloom ko apne homescreen mein kaise add karein
pwaBanner.iosStep2: 2. “Add To Home Screen” ko tap karein

notesFromBloomPromo.title: Nihshulk sahaayak sandesh
notesFromBloomPromo.description: Apane vhaatsep par seedhe saptaah mein do baar sandesh praapt karen
